entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 a.m. PDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 15.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 5:00 PM PDT Thursday 11 May 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 15.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: 7.9°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low 9.
